writer.name: 米洛斯拉夫·莫姆契洛维奇 Miroslav Momcilovic

director.name: 米洛斯拉夫·莫姆契洛维奇 Miroslav Momcilovic

introduction: 7 stories from the hood are intertwined with the same leitmotif of Seven Mortal Sins, in a dark humorous way dealing with everyday lives of the people of New Belgrade (Novi Beograd) who are obsessed with their weaknesses and driven by passions. Nothing human is strange to them and they don't hesitate to go beyond morality since they have a concept of their own ethics.In GREED story two bums want to trick football legend Diego Maradona sending him pathetic photos and video tapes and asking him for a financial help because of a fake health problem – an action which leads them to the madness of growing greed. ANGER story is about a bodybuilder hooked on steroids who wants to revenge for a humiliation once faced as a kid. In LUST story two middle aged guys share the same voyeur passion – they meet by Internet chatting and dating by faking real identities. They love to watch pictures of young girls but never cross the line of pedophilia. In GLUTTONY story a couple of cocktail party lovers who visit art exhibition openings in order to eat and drink, * SPOILER* this time accidentally eat off a modern art installation – human fat jelly. In PRIDE story a married couple exposes private dirty laundry in front of millions of watchers of TV quiz program. In SLOTH story two sophisticated 'waiting-for-godott' thieves who are lazy enough to climb upstairs to the top of the skyscraper to break and entry rich men's apartment end up in a place they've never dreamed of. In ENVY story two middle aged idlers envy a Bosnian refugee, a man who started his own fast food business…
